title: Textbook font with serifs and thick, not round, commas
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160713im_/http:/typophile.com/files/testestsetset_4008.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160713im_/http:/typophile.com/files/testsetset4_4865.png)

I would be very grateful if you would please find the font shown in the picture. It is unfortunate that I could not find a higher resolution image. This is a serif font with thick, not round, commas. The second image shows the font in italics as well.

Thank you very much!

Font: 

 Stone Serif 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160713/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
